description: Samsung with NFLGet amazing DVD images, plus improved connectivity, with Samsung’s DVD-1080p. Crisp, clear 1080p upconversion offers brilliant high-definition entertainment – it’s like enjoying your entire DVD library in a whole new way. Innovative HDMI-CEC connectivity offers one-remote convenience with your other Samsung electronics. Advanced BD Wise technology syncs your Samsung components for optimized picture and sound quality, every time. And multi-format playback – including DVD, MP3, WMA, JPEG and more – makes this player as versatile as it is impressive.Key Features1080p up-conversionSuper Scan PlaybackInstant skipInstant ReplayHDMI (High-Definition Multimedia Interface):transfers hi-definition (720p/1080i) video and audio from your DVD Player to your TV, Home Theater, or other digital AV components. Simply connect your DVD Player to your Home Theater System with a single cable for the high quality pictures and sound.HDMI-CEC (Anynet+):A true “plug and play” product, it comes with a Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) feature that lets you operate multiple HDMI products with a single remote control..14 bit video DACProgressive scan outputscans individual picture lines in sequencerather than alternately, maximizing the clarity of digital images andbringing new realism to your DVD viewing experience.DivX playback: Insert DVDs & CDs that have DivX movies downloaded via computer and enjoy watching them on a large-scale TV.ConnectionsVideoHDMI output: yesComponent video out: yesAudioCoaxial Out: yes
title: Samsung DVD-1080P9 1080p Upconverting DVD Player
